channel.title: Tutorial on Sherpa
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on Sherpa

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Getting Started With Sherpa Well, no time like the present to get started! Check this out, Run in Lab IGNORE { c:sp } <> A > "hello" "world" hello world Cool huh, you’ll notice we are now in the Sherpa “lab”. Note: these documents are integrated with Sherpa lab. Whenever you see the (TODO: Beaker symbol), you can click on it to open the lab to start experimenting with the related subject.
